name: Mythos (MYTH)
description: MYTH will be the native utility token of the Mythos Blockchain Ecosystem, providing utility for new blockchain games, facilitating ecosystem governance, and powering the Mythical Marketplace and Mythos DAO. Mythos helps gamers, developers, publishers, and content creators build web3-based interactive experiences by democratizing gaming through decentralized funding, multi-chain development tools, and unified marketplaces.
